Programming.name: Java
Programming.description: I am "fluent" in Java. I have a strong understanding of Java's object oriented programming model, multithreading architechture, i/o frameworks, and just about everything else.

Programming.name: JavaScript
Programming.description: There's some both terrible and wonderful about JavaScript. With it, I have created front-end webapps, backend webservers in Node.js, and everything inbetween.

Programming.name: Markup Languages
Programming.description: XML, JSON, and YAML are all important for programming, and I have worked with all of them.

Programming.name: GNU+Linux
Programming.description: Linux is great, and it is used on two-thirds of all internet servers. I own and run a small headless linux server as a hobby. I have also worked with Amazon Web Services (AWS) to automate server deployment, manage clusters, and balance loads.

Programming.name: Front-End Web Frameworks
Programming.description: I am great with Bootstrap, Skeleton.css, Foundation, and more. This website uses Foundation, compiled with SASS, and AngularJs

Programming.name: Python
Programming.description: I have strong experience in Python, especially the Django web framework

Programming.name: PHP
Programming.description: Like many others, PHP was my first web framework.

Programming.name: Shell Scripting
Programming.description: Ba/sh, Batch, and more. Great for automating system maintainence and more.

Music.name: Trumpet
Music.description: I have played trumpet since 4th grade, and have experience in concert band, pep band, and musical settings.

Music.name: Digital Sound Design and Music Production
Music.description: I took up digital music creation as a hobby. Using online tutorials, I have learned advanced sound design techniques, including subtractive, additive, and frequency-modulation synthesis.
